title: (x) Lastminute.com tech sans - FF DIN {Jan E}
content:
Hello all. Just wondering if anyone is able to identify this typeface for this logo. Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_magenta_bordino_5279.jpg)
author: missgiggles

comments.content: Thank you. I very much appreciate your help. Would you by any chance know any other fonts nearest to that font which could pass as that typeface but is close? Thanks.

Have a look at these older threads for alternatives to DIN: [[1]](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30888), [[2]](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32979)
